text: Mara d temlilem akked wid ijehlen, ewwtet ar tmegrav ar ten t$elbem. Arzet pen nezzeh. Sinna, d aserreê ne$ d feddu, alamma isers îôad tiâekkwmin is. Akka, lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, yili I$leb iten, maca a kwen Ijeôôeb, kra s kra. Wid ipwan$an deg ubrid n Öebbi, ur pôuêun igiten nnsen, d awez$i
